long_description: Inside this guide you'll find information on the best climbing routes and bouldering problems at many favorite areas in Connecticut. Author: David Fasulo. Softcover; 171 pages; black-and-white photographs and route maps. Globe Pequot Press; copyright 2002. Detailed topos for all the major crags. Descriptions of hundreds of routes. Background and historical information on many of the crags. Easy-to-follow driving and approach directions to climbing and bouldering destinations.
short_description: Inside this guide you'll find information on the best climbing routes and bouldering problems at many favorite areas in Connecticut.
